textBox.richText: Large crew descended on Winter Park...the full Stephens’, QJ, Pei, and Sarah, and Didi, Uli, Lara, and Lucas. Did some laps under Pano...got some fun footage there. Gunter and I tried to convince Michelle to go do some bumps instead of doing lunch, but alas, to no avail. We went and did some bump laps, but it was getting *really* warm. My waxing skills can deal with about 50F, but past that, and things get sticky. At that point, I wasn’t really having fun anymore, so I headed back to the car...and realized that I had lost my loaner cell phone! Bummer! The good news is that someone found it and turned it in, so I didn’t have to look like a major klutzoid to Greg.
